page.title: 15SUPERNATURAL
page.content: {Moore Hall Ghost. One morning in the 18th cent.the aunt of General Heron,owner of Moore Hall,is said to have fallen over 2nd floor handrail on to fixed bayonets of 2 soldiers waiting to escort general to Warrinton Academy.Family living there now and some of their visitors have sensed supernatural presence. Sometimes dog stiffens and refuses to go to Brown Room.Always circles stair case and never goes upstairs.Cat frequently disappears and has twice been found behind bolted door!Candles go out and lights go on mysteriously. On 3rd floor,where family do not sleep ,shuffling and scratching sounds heard as well as intermittant banging on the wall.Pendants have disappeared off wearers necks without chains being broken,one being found 3 days later.
